parameters.LOCAL_AUDIO_STREAM_ERROR_FAILURE: 1: No specified reason for the local audio failure.

parameters.LOCAL_AUDIO_STREAM_ERROR_DEVICE_NO_PERMI: 2: No permission to use the local audio device.

parameters.LOCAL_AUDIO_STREAM_ERROR_RECORD_FAILURE: 4: The local audio capturing fails. Check whether the capturing device is working properly.
